questions.question: What is the predominant color of the visible product surface?
What is the overall shape of the main circular component?
What appears to be the primary material used in the product's construction?
Considering the visible handle, what is its apparent function in relation to the main body?
Describing the texture, is the surface of the main component smooth or rough?
What is the shape of the smaller component attached to the main circular component?
What is the apparent function of the smaller component with visible vanes?
Considering the design, does the product have a noticeable handle?
What is the overall design style of the product; is it simple or ornate?
What is the most prominent shape on the main component other than the circular frame?
What is the apparent finish of the visible plastic surfaces; is it glossy or matte?
Looking at the small component, is its appearance uniform or patterned?
What seems to be the primary method of attaching the smaller component to the larger one?
What is the apparent number of visible mounting points/tabs on the smaller component?
Observing the handle, is its curvature uniform or does it have noticeable bends?
